slide.description: This is a microsite created for the diabetic line of Amfit inserts. I designed and programmed the site to be used as part of Amfit's campaign, educating their customers (Orthopedists and Pedorthists) about the new line of diabetic inserts while capturing new leads. The site is programmed with xhtml, css, and javascript (jquery). Credits: Created while employed at Kinesis.
slide.title: Homepage

slide.description: The dynamic calculator on the homepage uses javascript to create a simple way for the potential customer to learn if they could save money by using Amfit inserts. Credits: Created while employed at Kinesis.
slide.title: Calculator

slide.description: An important part of the microsite was a contact form for capturing leads. Credits: Created while employed at Kinesis.
